Instance.description: Global tuning parameters for client-side telemetry.

TunableList.name: UIEvents
TunableList.description: Specifies the different ways a censor can be applied, like full body, torso only, etc.

Tunable.name: Event
Tunable.description: UI event to map. This can either be the full event name or a prefix: 'gainFocus' will match both 'gainFocus' and 'gainFocus.leftButton'.

Tunable.name: HookGroup
Tunable.description: Module ID for the telemetry hook; exactly four characters. For example, for the telemetry hook CLNT/GAME/TIME, this would be GAME.

Tunable.name: HookName
Tunable.description: Name ID for the telemetry hook; exactly four characters. For example, for the telemetry hook CLNT/GAME/TIME, this would be TIME.

TunableEnum.name: Mode
TunableEnum.description: What type of telemetry to produce on this event.
